scripts.sync: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./resources/scripts/sync-azure-users.script.ts
scripts.sync-organizations: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-azure-organizations/sync-azure-organizations.start.ts
scripts.sync-existing-persons-with-azureid: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-existing-persons-with-azureid/sync-existing-persons-with-azureid.start.ts
scripts.sync-enrollments: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-azure-enrollments/sync-azure-enrollments-start.ts
scripts.sync-accountants: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-azure-accountants/sync-azure-accountants.start.ts
scripts.sync-institutions-azure-ids: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-institutions-azure-ids/sync-institutions-azure-ids.start.ts
scripts.sync-azure-ids: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-azure-ids/sync-azure-ids.start.ts
scripts.sync-users-from-azure: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-users-from-azure/sync-users-from-azure.start.ts
scripts.sync-personal-ids: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-personal-ids/sync-personal-ids.start.ts
scripts.sync-azure-ids-for-external-users: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-azure-ids-for-external-users/sync-azure-ids-for-external-users.start.ts
scripts.insert-azure-create: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/insert-azure-create/insert-azure-create.start.ts
scripts.re-run-failed-calls: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/re-run-failed-calls/re-run-failed-calls.start.ts
scripts.sync-curriculums-without-azureid: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/sync-curriculums-without-azureid/sync-curriculums-without-azureid.start.ts
scripts.fix-accountant-roles: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/fix-accountant-roles/fix-accountant-roles.start.ts
scripts.codes:generate: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/generate-student-codes/generate-student-codes.start.ts
scripts.fix-short-student-username: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/fix-short-student-username/fix-short-student-username.start.ts
scripts.deactivate-old-student-usernames: npm run build && npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/models/cli-scripts/deactivate-old-student-usernames/deactivate-old-student-usernames.start.ts
scripts.db:migrate: npm run build && ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -c default
scripts.db:rollback-one:migration: npm run build && ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -c default
scripts.db:rollback-one:seed: npm run build && ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -c app-seed
scripts.db:seed: npm run build && ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -c app-seed
scripts.db:migration:generate: npm run build && npm run typeorm migration:generate -- -c default -n MigrationTest
scripts.db:migration:create: npm run build && npm run typeorm migration:create -- --n EmptyMigration
